item.title: Te Iwa Here o Turi Kōkā
item.description: I tūhura a Scramble me Kuputupu e ahau. Ki te kite ki ngā pū, ka hanga mea au. E whakaaro ana au i ia pārekareka. 3 blank tiles (scoring 0 points) 1 point: A ×25, I ×25, O ×25, U ×20 2 points: E ×15, R ×15, T ×15, K ×12, N ×12, W ×12 3 points: H ×10, M ×10, P ×10 4 points: NG ×10 5 points: WH ×6 Diacritical marks are ignored.

item.title: Te Waru o Here Turi Kōkā
item.description: I haere tōku whānau ki Cobb and Co ki Pari-a-rua. He wahi tino pukumahi! Ka okioki ahau ināianei.

item.title: Te Whitu o Here Turi Kōkā
item.description: I mauiui a Wira. I māturu tōnā ihu hūpē. Kei te harikoa ahau mō Rangi Kiriata. Website: Pae tukutuku Google: Kūkara Youtube: TiriAta Tinder: Pūahi Ipo Netflix: Rangi Kiriata / Netewhiriki

item.title: Te Ono o Here Turi Kōkā
item.description: Kei te whakaohooho ahau i te tūruapō. Ngā mihi nui ki ActionStation! Ma whero ma pango ka oti ai te mahi. A Vision of Aotearoa 2040

item.title: Te Rima Here o turi kōkā
item.description: I kite au i ēnei rauemi mīharo ināianei. I tīkina ngā tamariki e ahau. I haere ahau mā raro. Kei te ngenge ahau.
